page.title: 20DALGETY BAY SCHOOL ARTS CAMP
page.content: In{June}of this year twenty children from{Dalgety Bay Primary School}went to {Belmont Camp}near{Meigle}in{ {Perthshire.}It was a music camp and{ {Dalgety Bay Primary School}was only one of about{14}schools going to put on a performance of{" The Perfect {Present"}.It had been written especially for about{200}children.The camp lasted only a week but on the {Monday}and{Tuesday}after we came back we put on two performances of the play{"The Perfect Present".}The rehearsals were in the hall at{Belmont {Camp}and were split in short sessions with a break in between.The performances were held at{Camdean {School}in{Rosyth.}It was great fun! {All of the work in this project was {done by the P7 children of room 14 , {Dalgety Bay School,and their teacher, {Mr Oliphant.
